course.title: MAT 2322 Calculus III for Engineers (3 units)
course.desc: Extrema of functions of several variables. Multiple integration and applications. Vector fields and their derivatives. Curves. Vector differential operators. Line integrals. Surfaces and surface integrals. Theorems of Stokes, Gauss, etc.Course Component: LecturePrerequisites: (MAT 1322 or MAT 1325 or MAT 1332), (MAT 1341 or CEGEP linear algebra). The courses MAT 2322, MAT 2122, MAT 2121 cannot be combined for units.
